summary: In a small community in the Danube Delta that wavers between old traditions and new material aspirations, a teenager, Ryna, pays a heavy price in a search of her own identity.
cast: Dorotheea Petre|Valentin Popescu|Matthieu Rozé|Nicolae Praida|Aura Calarasu|Theodor Delciu|George Custura|Radu Romaniuc|Constantin Ghenescu|Dana Talos|George Robu|Oxana Moravec
title: Ryna
